dcterms:description: IWSLT14 German-English (De-En) dataset contains 153K training sentence pairs. The validation set consists of 7K data from the training set, and the test set is a combination of dev2010, dev2012, tst2010, tst2011, and tst2012 with 7K sentences, preprocessed using a specific script. The BPE algorithm is used to process words into subwords, resulting in 10K subword tokens.
dcterms:title: IWSLT14 German-English (De-En)

dcterms:description: WMT14 English-German (En-De) dataset consists of 4.5M sentence pairs for training. The validation set is a combination of newstest2012 and newstest2013, while the test set is newstest2014, all preprocessed using a specific script. Sentences longer than 250 are removed from the training dataset, and the dataset is segmented by BPE, resulting in 40K subwords in the shared vocabulary.
dcterms:title: WMT14 English-German (En-De)
